idea-plugin.name: Blade Scheme
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1) Changed background for RECENT_LOCATIONS_SELECTION 2) Changed background for DOCUMENTATION_COLOR (fixed white background in PHPStorm 2021.1) 3) Changed background for NOT_TOP_FRAME_ATTRIBUTES 4) Changed foreground for DEFAULT_KEYWORD
idea-plugin.description: Blade is the dark color scheme for the PHPStorm IDE.
